name: Retribution
props: +15% Chance to deal Electrical Damage when shield struck by melee enemies.

name: Adaptation
props: +5% Resistance to that Damage Type for 10s. Stacks up to 90%.

name: Reflection
props: 16% Damage taken is reflected when Blocking attacks while Channeling.

name: Rolling Guard
props: Become invulnerable for 2s and remove all Status Effects. 12s cooldown.

name: Heavy Impact
props: Create 1m seismic shockwaves from heavy landings, dealing 50 Damage and knocking foes off their feet.

name: Avenging Truth
props: Blocking absorbs 20% of incoming damage, stored as extra damage for the next charge attack.

name: Disarming Purity
props: Secondary Fire mode has a 10% chance to disarm enemies.

name: Entropy Detonation
props: Lethal ground attacks cause enemies to explode dealing +250

name: Neutralizing Justice
props: Each Miter blade has a +22.5% chance to immediately destroy a Nullifier field.

name: Voltage Sequence
props: Killing a flying enemy creates a lightning trap from their remains, lasting 2s

name: Shotgun Ammo Mutation
props: Converts unused ammo pickups into Shotgun ammo. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Primed Shotgun Ammo Mutation
props: Converts unused ammo pickups into Shotgun ammo. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Acid Shells
props: Enemies explode on death, dealing 75 <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage (+8% Enemy Max Health) in a 2.5m radius.

name: Fomorian Accelerant
props: Flak now bounces up to 1x and travels 15% faster.

name: Vigilante Supplies
props: Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 2.

name: Tek Collateral
props: +25% Critical Damage when inside the Marked Zone.

name: Tek Gravity
props: Slam Attacks in the Marked Zone pull all enemies within 6m.

name: Tek Assault
props: Kavat has 15% chance to ignore Lethal Damage and be immune for 1s.

name: Strain Consume
props: Dead maggots within 5m are consumed, restoring 1% Missing Health.

name: Strain Infection
props: Melee Attacks gain +5% Critical Damage per Cyst.

name: Mecha Pulse
props: Killing a Marked Enemy grants +15% Armor for 5s for each enemy within 7.5m.

name: Rifle Ammo Mutation
props: Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Arrow Mutation
props: Converts unused ammo pickups into Arrows. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Primed Rifle Ammo Mutation
props: Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Nightwatch Napalm
props: Rockets disperse napalm, inflicting 5% damage over 1s across 15% of the explosion area.

name: Thermagnetic Shells
props: Enemies explode on death, dealing 20 <DT_MAGNETIC>Magnetic Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1.5m radius.

name: Flux Overdrive
props: Status Chance fluctuates between +25% and +41% over 5s while the beam is fired.

name: Pistol Ammo Mutation
props: Converts unused ammo pickups into Pistol ammo. Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Primed Pistol Ammo Mutation
props: Converts unused ammo pickups into Pistol ammo. Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Rift Strike
props: Charge attacks now step through the rift to attack enemies up to 5m away

name: Hunter's Bonesaw
props: Increase Damage by 15% and Status Chance by 10% when attacking a prone enemy.

name: Vulcan Blitz
props: Enemies explode on death, dealing 50 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1m radius.

name: Electromagnetic Shielding
props: While blocking, redirect 25% of damage taken by allies within 2m to yourself.

name: Static Discharge
props: Charge Attacks electrify nearby enemies for <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage equal to 30% of weapon damage.

name: Empowered Blades
props: Charge attacks get +10% Status Chance and Status Damage but drains 15 Shields per hit.

name: Brief Respite
props: Converts 25% of Energy spent to Shields while Overshields are inactive.

name: Peculiar Growth
props: Damaging an enemy will inflate the body part hit for 1s.

name: Calm & Frenzy
props: Rest & Rage Augment: Killing an affected enemy causes the effect to spread to enemies within 2m for 40% of the remaining duration.

name: Duality
props: Metamorphosis Augment: Equinox's other half breaks free for 7s, dealing 100% Damage.

name: Energy Transfer
props: Mend & Maim Augment: 50% of charge is conserved when switching between forms.

name: Peaceful Provocation
props: Pacify & Provoke Augment: Pacify converts damage done to allies into an aura that slows enemies by 20%. Provoke converts damage done to enemies into 6% extra Ability Strength.

name: Shocking Speed
props: Speed Augment: Enemies touched while sprinting under the effects of Speed will take 75 <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage with guaranteed proc.

name: Shock Trooper
props: Shock Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage to their attacks for 28s.

name: Transistor Shield
props: Electric Shield Augment: Allies can pick up Electric Shield. 25% of damage absorbed will be added to Volt's Static Discharge.

name: Capacitance
props: Discharge Augment: Converts 1.5% of Damage dealt into Shields split between Volt and Squadmates.

name: Pool of Life
props: Well of Life Augment: On death, marked enemies will drop 1 Health Orbs with a 10% chance of dropping an Energy Orb.

name: Abating Link
props: Link Augment: Reduces Armor Rating by 25% on enemies targeted by Link.

name: Vampire Leech
props: Energy Vampire Augment: Excess Energy replenishes Shields by 85%.

name: Tesla Link
props: Tesla Augment: Every pair of Teslas will connect forming a beam that will cause 100 <DT_SLASH>Slash Damage when contacted.

name: Perpetual Vortex
props: Vortex Augment: Vortex's duration is increased by 50% of its Maximum Duration for each additional Vortex thrown into it.

name: Repelling Bastille
props: Bastille Augment: Enemies within the Bastille have a 50% chance to be repelled every 4s.

name: Jet Stream
props: Turbulence Augment: Turbulence increases Movement Speed by 20% and Projectile Speed by 50% for Zephyr and her allies.

name: Funnel Clouds
props: Tornado Augment: Creates 2 additional tornadoes. All tornadoes are 50% their original size and won't pick up enemies.

name: Target Fixation
props: Tail Wind Augment: Each enemy hit increases Tail Wind Damage by 30%. Damage resets upon landing.

name: Contagion Cloud
props: Toxic Lash Augment: Create 2m toxic clouds, dealing 100 <DT_POISON>Toxin/s for 8s with every kill. Damage is twice as strong for Melee kills.

name: Regenerative Molt
props: Molt Augment: After casting Molt, Saryn regenerates 20 Health/s for 10s.

name: Venom Dose
props: Spores Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage to their attacks for 28s.

name: Negation Swarm
props: Scarab Swarm Augment: Scarab Armor protects Inaros from Status Effects, consuming 6% Bonus Armor for each effect resisted.

name: Elemental Sandstorm
props: Sandstorm Augment: Sandstorm has a 25% chance of inflicting Status Effects based on the Damage Types and mods on equipped Melee Weapon.

name: Reinforcing Stomp
props: Rhino Stomp Augment: Iron Skin Health is replenished by 55 for each enemy affected.

name: Ironclad Charge
props: Rhino Charge Augment: Each enemy hit increases Rhino's Armor Rating by 12% for 4s.

name: Piercing Roar
props: Roar Augment: Enemies within 10m will suffer from a <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Proc.

name: Iron Shrapnel
props: Iron Skin Augment: Recasting Iron Skin will cause it to detonate, dealing 40% of its remaining Health as <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Damage, and knocking down enemies.

name: Infiltrate
props: Prowl Augment: Ivara is able to bypass laser barriers and gains 10% Movement Speed.

name: Empowered Quiver
props: Quiver Augment: Dashwire grants allies 75% Critical Damage. Cloak arrow has a 50% chance to prevent Status Effects.

name: Piercing Navigator
props: Navigator Augment: Each hit increases the projectile's Critical Chance by 2.5% up to a max of 50%.

name: Concentrated Arrow
props: Artemis Bow Augment: Fires a single arrow that has +20% Critical Chance on Headshots and explodes in a 7m radius. Removes Punch Through.

name: Warding Thurible
props: Thurible Augment: Allies in range take 15% less Damage while channeling Thurible and grant 0.2 additional Energy charge whenever damaged.

name: Lasting Covenant
props: Covenant Augment: Headshot kills increase Critical Chance bonus duration by 1s.

name: Tidal Impunity
props: Tidal Surge Augment: Clears Status Effects and grants 3s of Proc Immunity for yourself and allies that come in contact with it.

name: Curative Undertow
props: Undertow Augment: Allies can enter the pool to regain 15% Health every 1.5s, with each ally in the pool increasing Energy drain on Hydroid.

name: Pilfering Swarm
props: Tentacle Swarm Augment: Enemies held by tentacles have a 25% chance at additional drops.

name: Corroding Barrage
props: Tempest Barrage Augment: Each projectile has a 50% chance of inflicting a <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Status Effect.

name: Hallowed Eruption
props: Hallowed Ground Augment: The next time this ability is cast it will consume the Hallowed Ground, dealing the remaining damage in a burst with 30% Proc Chance of <DT_RADIATION>Radiation.

name: Smite Infusion
props: Smite Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_RADIATION>Radiation Damage to their attacks for 28s.

name: Phoenix Renewal
props: Renewal Augment: Taking fatal damage while under the effects of Renewal will instead Heal you or allies to 20% Health. This effect triggers only once for each ally every 90s.

name: Hallowed Reckoning
props: Reckoning Augment: Enemies affected by Reckoning spawn zones that increase Armor by 150 for allies and inflicts 100 Damage to enemies over 7s.

name: Fatal Teleport
props: Teleport Augment: Teleport will perform a Finisher on the target, dealing 125% Extra Damage. 50% of Energy cost is refunded on a kill.

name: Smoke Shadow
props: Smoke Screen Augment: Conceals allies for 2s.

name: Rising Storm
props: Blade Storm Augment: Melee multiplier lasts 50% longer before it resets.

name: Seeking Shuriken
props: Shuriken Augment: Hits expose weaknesses on enemies, reducing their Armor by 35% for 2s.

name: Pyroclastic Flow
props: Fire Walker Augment: Accumulate 75% of the damage Fire Walker deals, unleashing it in a trail of fire that lasts 6s.

name: Safeguard
props: Warding Halo Augment: Can now be cast on allies with 20% effectiveness.

name: Reaping Chakram
props: Blazing Chakram Augment: Each enemy hit increases the ring's Damage by 1.25x and the chance for enemies to drop Health Orbs on death by +0.10x.

name: Creeping Terrify
props: Terrify Augment: Affected enemies have 30% reduced Movement Speed.

name: Soul Survivor
props: Soul Punch Augment: Use on a downed ally to revive him with 15% Health. Nekros's Energy will be consumed.

name: Despoil
props: Desecrate Augment: No longer consumes Energy, but consumes 16 Health per corpse instead.

name: Shield of Shadows
props: Shadows of the Dead Augment: Each Shadow within 50m take 3% of the Damage done to Nekros in his stead.

name: Primal Rage
props: Primal Fury Augment: Killing an enemy increases Critical Chance by 6%. The increase decays by 1%/s

name: Iron Vault
props: Iron Jab Augment: Aiming Iron Jab at the ground launches Wukong into the air. Executing a Slam Attack increases Range by 8m and applies 300% Extra Damage.

name: Enveloping Cloud
props: Cloud Walker Augment: Allies within 2.5m of the cloud become invisible to enemies for 8s.

name: Rift Torrent
props: Rift Surge Augment: Limbo deals 15% Extra Damage for each enemy affected by Rift Surge while in the rift.

name: Cataclysmic Continuum
props: Cataclysm Augment: Duration increased by 0.3s for each enemy killed.

name: Haven
props: Banish Augment: Allies banished to the rift will have 10% of their Maximum Health restored.

name: Counter Pulse
props: Polarize Augment: Enemy weapons are jammed and robotics are disabled for 2s when hit by Polarize.

name: Greedy Pull
props: Pull Augment: Adds 40% chance to pull pickups towards Mag.

name: Fracturing Crush
props: Crush Augment: Survivors have their Armor decreased by 20% and become unable to move for 4s.

name: Magnetized Discharge
props: Magnetize Augment: Manually detonate Magnetize by recasting on the target. Enemies hit have a 20% chance to become disarmed.

name: Safeguard Switch
props: Switch Teleport Augment: After teleporting with an ally they will be invulnerable for 3s.

name: Hushed Invisibility
props: Invisibility Augment: Weapon noise is reduced by 50% while invisible.

name: Irradiating Disarm
props: Radial Disarm Augment: Enemies will be affected by <DT_RADIATION>Radiation for 4s.

name: Savior Decoy
props: Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases Casting Speed of Decoy by 20%

name: Accumulating Whipclaw
props: Whipclaw Augment: Hitting 3 enemies will grant a 10% stacking Damage Bonus to subsequent Whipclaws. Bonus will decay after 10s.

name: Assimilate
props: Absorb Augment: Nyx can move at 30% Speed while using Absorb, but the area is reduced by half.

name: Mind Freak
props: Mind Control Augment: Controlled target inflicts +200% Damage.

name: Pacifying Bolts
props: Psychic Bolts Augment: Affected enemies will be confused for 4s.

name: Chaos Sphere
props: Chaos Augment: Enemies entering the Effect Range will be inflicted with Chaos. Effect Range lasts for 25% of the ability duration and shrinks over time.

name: Larva Burst
props: Larva Augment: Reactivate Larva to detonate and deal 150 <DT_POISON>Toxin Damage in a 1m radius. This damage stacks for every enemy grabbed by the Larva.

name: Insatiable
props: Ravenous Augment: Nidus has a 35% chance of generating an additional Mutation stack whenever he gains one, while standing in the Ravenous infestation.

name: Explosive Legerdemain
props: Sleight of Hand Augment: Ammo and Orbs pickups are turned into proximity mines that deal 150 Damage with a 15% Proc Chance.

name: Total Eclipse
props: Eclipse Augment: While active, allies within 3m gain 25% benefit from Eclipse.

name: Hall of Malevolence
props: Hall of Mirrors Augment: The damage of your doppelgangers is increased by 2% every time you kill an enemy.

name: Mending Splinters
props: Splinter Storm Augment: For each target affected, Splinter Storm heals 1.5 Health/s.

name: Freeze Force
props: Freeze Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_FREEZE>Cold Damage to their attacks for 28s.

name: Ice Wave Impedance
props: Ice Wave Augment: Leaves a frozen trail for 6s that slows down enemies that come into contact with it.

name: Chilling Globe
props: Snow Globe Augment: Enemies that enter have a 30% chance to become frozen solid for 4s.

name: Icy Avalanche
props: Avalanche Augment: Grants allies within the radius with a coat of ice that absorbs 40 Damage per enemy hit.

name: Beguiling Lantern
props: Lantern Augment: Attracted enemies take 25% more Melee Damage.

name: Razorwing Blitz
props: Razorwing Augment: Flight Speed increased by 25% and Fire Rate increased by 25% for 2s when using abilities. Stacks up to 4x.

name: Chromatic Blade
props: Exalted Blade Augment: Exalted Blade's Damage Type changes depending on Excalibur's Energy Color and Status Chance is increased by 25%.

name: Surging Dash
props: Slash Dash Augment: Each enemy hit during Slash Dash further increases your Melee Counter by 1.

name: Furious Javelin
props: Radial Javelin Augment: Each enemy hit will increase Excalibur's Melee Damage by 3% for 6s.

name: Radiant Finish
props: Radial Blind Augment: Blinded enemies take 150% more Finisher Damage.

name: Firequake
props: World On Fire Augment: Enemies hit have a 50% chance of being knocked down.

name: Flash Accelerant
props: Accelerant Augment: Accelerant gives +20% Casting Speed and +50% <DT_FIRE>Heat damage to allies within range.

name: Fire Fright
props: Fire Blast Augment: Damage done by Fire Blast has a 40% chance to cause enemies to panic.

name: Fireball Frenzy
props: Fireball Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_FIRE>Heat Damage to their attacks for 28s.

name: Vexing Retaliation
props: Vex Armor Augment: Taking 150 Damage will trigger a 4m burst. Shield damage will cause a <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Proc while Health damage will cause a <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Proc.

name: Guided Effigy
props: Effigy Augment: Cast and hold to make Effigy move to your aim point. Deals 500 Damage/s to enemies in its path and roars on arrival stunning nearby enemies.

name: Everlasting Ward
props: Elemental Ward Augment: Allies that leave the radius will retain the effect for 50% of the remaining duration.

name: Afterburn
props: Spectral Scream Augment: Upon deactivation, Chroma will launch an elemental projectile dealing 25 Damage for each second the ability was active, to a maximum of 200 Damage.

name: Muzzle Flash
props: Shooting Gallery Augment: Does a burst before switching between players, blinding enemies within 5m for 4s.

name: Staggering Shield
props: Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a 30% chance of staggering enemies.

name: Ballistic Bullseye
props: Ballistic Battery Augment: Applies a 70% Status Chance bonus to the shot, based on the amount charged.

name: Titanic Rumbler
props: Rumblers Augment: Create a single rumbler with 120% Health, 120% Damage, and 50% Speed that taunts nearby enemies into attacking it.

name: Path of Statues
props: Landslide Augment: Leave a trail for 7s that petrifies enemies for 4s.

name: Ore Gaze
props: Petrify Augment: Petrified enemies are scanned into the Codex and have a 10% chance to drop additional loot when killed.

name: Tectonic Fracture
props: Tectonics Augment: Create up to 2 walls with 70% Health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.

name: Prolonged Paralysis
props: Paralysis Augment: Affected enemies are pulled towards Valkyr and the stun duration is increased by 50%.

name: Hysterical Assault
props: Hysteria Augment: Use Secondary Fire to leap onto enemies up to 15m away.

name: Eternal War
props: Warcry Augment: While active, Warcry's duration is increased by 1.25s for each Melee Kill.

name: Swing Line
props: Rip Line Augment: After using Rip Line, the next 1 Rip Lines will have no Energy cost while Airborne.

name: Partitioned Mallet
props: Mallet Augment: Allows for two simultaneous Mallets, each with 70% reduced range.

name: Conductor
props: Resonator Augment: Reactivate the ability to command Resonator to move to your aim point at 100% Speed.

name: Resonance
props: Sonar Augment: Killing an enemy by shooting their weak spot will trigger another Sonar for 50% of remaining duration.

name: Savage Silence
props: Silence Augment: Finisher Damage is increased by 150% while Silence is active.

name: Sonic Fracture
props: Sonic Boom Augment: Enemy Armor is reduced by 35% for 2s.

name: Resonating Quake
props: Sound Quake Augment: Forgoes channeling to create a shockwave that deals 10x Damage at the epicenter, gradually weakening as it expands out.

name: Cold Snap
props: Cosmic Crush Augment: The black hole saps the area of heat, freezing enemies in range. Enemies near the black hole are completely frozen for 2s.

name: Energy Field
props: Energy Shell Augment: Energy Shell applies to allies within 80m.

name: Afterburner
props: Core Vent Augment: <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage ignites exhaust fumes for 6s. Enemies passing through the flames take 200 <DT_FIRE>Heat Damage.

name: Escape Velocity
props: Worm Hole Augment: Allies that travel through wormhole gain a 30% Speed bonus for 4s.

name: Neutron Star
props: Null Star Augment: Recasting Null Star will make all remaining particles explode, causing 60 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage with guaranteed Proc in 4m.

name: Antimatter Absorb
props: Antimatter Drop Augment: Absorbs enemy bullets within 1m, increasing its damage when it explodes.
